Title: Oh my god the X broadcast ui is so unintuitive. I didn't realize I had to post I thought it would au...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Oh my god the X broadcast ui is so unintuitive. I didn't realize I had to post I thought it would auto post. Enjoy the VOD. Going to stream about this time almost every day going forward. Feels so much smoother now that I don't have to run the code.
